title: Classic Analog Watch
summary: Watch Face that shows the current time, month, day and date.
description: An elegant watch face that shows the current time, month, day of week and date.Designed for square, round and Moto 360 Android Wear watches.In minimal ambient mode, the hour and minute hands are shown.In detailed ambient mode, month, day of week and date are shown in addition to the hour and minute.Version 1.0.2:-- Ability to select static hand shadows from Android Wear Companion App.- 5.1.1 compatibility.- Bug fixes.Version 1.0.1:-- Dynamic hand and sub dial shadows based on watch orientation.- Ability to turn shadows on/off from Android Wear Companion App.Configuration Instructions:-- Touch the watch face in the Android Wear Companion App on your mobile.- Select shadow options- Touch the "SEND TO WATCH" button   - You should see a "Sent to Watch" toast on the mobile and    - a toast on the watch showing the shadow options chosen.   - If you don't see the confirmation toast on the watch, repeat sending to watch again.If you like it, please rate and check out the Moon Phase version also.Please email us if you face any issues and do check out our other designs as well.
descriptionHTML:
An elegant watch face that shows the current time, month, day of week and date.

Designed for square, round and Moto 360 Android Wear watches.

In minimal ambient mode, the hour and minute hands are shown.
In detailed ambient mode, month, day of week and date are shown in addition to the hour and minute.

Version 1.0.2:-

- Ability to select static hand shadows from Android Wear Companion App.
- 5.1.1 compatibility.
- Bug fixes.


Version 1.0.1:-

- Dynamic hand and sub dial shadows based on watch orientation.
- Ability to turn shadows on/off from Android Wear Companion App.

Configuration Instructions:-

- Touch the watch face in the Android Wear Companion App on your mobile.
- Select shadow options
- Touch the "SEND TO WATCH" button
- You should see a "Sent to Watch" toast on the mobile and
- a toast on the watch showing the shadow options chosen.
- If you don't see the confirmation toast on the watch, repeat sending to watch again.


If you like it, please rate and check out the Moon Phase version also.


Please email us if you face any issues and do check out our other designs as well.
comments: Awesome Best watch face ever. Doesn't consume battery. And notifications are great in ambiant mode. Just a suggestion, it would be better if we could remove center of clock in dark mode so not a single point will remain active all the time.

Nice! Except... First, thank you for this free app, it's very nice! except... that it is stated automatic but it ticks like a quartz watch, second by second instead of a smooth sweeping motion (so -1*). Some numbers and words are entirely upside down like "Jul" & "24" (-1*). If these points are corrected together with a few additional options, e.g. moon phase, battery, I'll even be willing to pay for the pro version. But keep up the good work!
I cant find this watch face on the LG Urbane after updating to android 2.0
Classic analog watch face Very elegant need more gold faces
Simply a classic design. Low battery use. Even set up for the Moto 360.
recentChanges: - Option for detailed ambient mode (not default)
- Support for all Moto 360 gen 2 watches
